JobTitle: PDM Consulting Epic Clarity Caboodle Analyst-Core Business Operations
JobFullDesc: Are you an experienced, passionate pioneer in technology? An industry solutions professional who wants to work in a collaborative environment. As an experienced (Skillset example - Healthcare Solutions) you will have the ability to share new ideas and collaborate on projects as a consultant without the extensive demands of travel. If so, consider an opportunity with Deloitte under our Project Delivery Talent Model. Project Delivery Model (PDM) is a talent model that is tailored specifically for long-term, onsite client service delivery. PDM practitioners are local to project locations, minimizing extensive travel, and provides you with a full career path within the firm. Work you'll do/Responsibilities  Industry-leading clients. An award-winning culture. Top notch connections. Big opportunities. At Deloitte, you'll work with the best in the business to solve the toughest problems in business. From learning to leadership, this is your chance to take your career to the next level.  Project activities includes but not restricted to :  Automation, Dev/Ops Support/Coordination,  • Stronger delivery Schedule to alignment with Release schedule,  • Performance tuning  • Support for additional non-prod environment build  • Deployment/Release management support for Clarity, Caboodle, Slicer Dicer solutions  • Clarity/Caboodle development support and administration  o Concept Phase - Attend the business discussion with the intention of participation and collaboration to the Business Requirements documentation.  o Definition Phase -Work in coordination with architecture and IT team to define the solution definition; Perform the data analysis work to facilitate the gap analysis exercise; Work with solution consultant to define the logical data model for the solution.  o Development Planning - Attend logical and physical design discussions and brainstorming sessions. Contribute to development project plans and unit testing timelines. Make sure the development environment is ready and escalate if it is not.  o Development - Develop the solution using ETL, reporting or database tools as per the business requirements mentioned in the physical solution design document.  o Unit Testing - Creating Unit test spec documents and test the application with the data available in the environment. Document unit test and results in Quality Center or another applicable too.  Support Cogito Release Mgmt, Custom Caboodle development, performance tuning (SlicerDicer)  Support Cogito Release Mgmt, Custom Caboodle development, performance tuning (SlicerDicer) Caboodle/SlicerDicer Focus:  • Delivery of development per committed timeline/schedule  • Completion of documentations and all updates with the development. For ex. Data dictionary notes, Data lineage, Git Hub etc.  • Conduct performance analysis/tuning of custom development  • Identify opportunity for improvement (innovation)  Caboodle/SlicerDicer Focus:  • Delivery of development per committed timeline/schedule  • Completion of documentations and all updates with the development. For ex. Data dictionary notes, Data lineage, Git Hub etc.  • Conduct performance analysis/tuning of custom development  • Identify opportunity for improvement (innovation)  Regular communication with client and project leadership to ensure smooth functioning of project  Supports the stability, availability, and performance of enterprise systems (e.g., systems, applications, network, databases, storage, security) by performing analysis to identify problems, trends, and opportunities for improvement. The Team  The US Core Industry Solutions Offering encompasses industry vertical, sector specific solutions that leverage distinct technologies to drive operational change and automate the core our client's business. We incorporate expertise from across the firm to leverage common approaches, best practices, and strategic investments to scale these solutions according to industry strategy. Core Industry Solutions will be known in the market for a focus on transforming industry operations through industry technology solutions. Qualifications Required 1: 5+ years of experience in Epic reporting  2: Epic Clarity/Caboodle certification (Ambulatory)  3: Business Objects/Crystal Reports knowledge and working experience  4: SSIS and SQL knowledge and working experience  5: Radar dashboard knowledge and experience  College Degree or equivalent:  Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Business Management, Information Systems or an equivalent degree  MINUMIM YEARS OF EXPERIENCE   5 years of experience in Epic reporting  Preferred Qualifications:  1: Informatica PowerCenter  2: Microsoft Cloud Solution Provider, Python, Power BI, Tableau  3: SAS Visual Analytics, SAS Administration.  Limited sponsorship may be available How you'll grow  At Deloitte, our professional development plan focuses on helping people at every level of their career to identify and use their strengths to do their best work every day. From entry-level employees to senior leaders, we believe there's always room to learn. We offer opportunities to help sharpen skills in addition to hands-on experience in the global, fast-changing business world. From on-the-job learning experiences to formal development programs, our professionals have a variety of opportunities to continue to grow throughout their career.  #LI-CONS  #IND:CONS
